contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of August, 2009, the Petition for Extension of Time to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal, treated as a Petition to File a Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc, is GRANTED. Counsel is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 30 days of the entry of this order.
